title: 我无法打开我的服务器
author: GerNazi
txt_content:
今天本来是想重启一下服务器的，结果出错了。
萌新腐竹什么都不懂啊。
大佬们有什么解决办法吗？


下面一串错误代码
[Server thread/ERROR] [net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer]: Exception stopping the server
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: null
        at java.util.zip.Deflater.init(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_261]
        at java.util.zip.Deflater.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_261]
        at java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_261]
        at java.util.zip.GZIPOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_261]
        at net.minecraft.nbt.CompressedStreamTools.func_74799_a(CompressedStreamTools.java:43) ~[gi.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75755_a(SaveHandler.java:154) ~[bfb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.chunk.storage.AnvilSaveHandler.func_75755_a(AnvilSaveHandler.java:44) ~[bey.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_73042_a(WorldServer.java:1292) ~[oo.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_73044_a(WorldServer.java:1233) ~[oo.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71267_a(MinecraftServer.java:489) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71260_j(MinecraftServer.java:540) ~[MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:680) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_261]
[00:15:03] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: The state engine was in incorrect state SERVER_STARTING and forced into state SERVER_STOPPED. Errors may have been discarded.

replies.author: Jesenv5
replies.txt_content: 查看错误提示是你的内存不足，试试把jvm的内存调小。

replies.author: GerNazi
replies.txt_content:
小龍v5 发表于 2020-7-20 00:30
查看错误提示是你的内存不足，试试把jvm的内存调小。
好了，谢谢。
